thread.title: Wood holds off La Salle on late FG
thread.title_full: Wood holds off La Salle on late FG

title: Wood holds off La Salle on late FG
text:
More coverage: Southeastern Pa. high school sports 
On the first play of the deciding series, Gianni Cruel's 31-yard catch and run put the ball at the 31. After four running plays, Dan Freeman's 13-yard reception on a left-side screen left it at the 10. 
Wood, ranked No. 2 in Southeastern Pennsylvania by The Inquirer, improved to 6-0. No. 4 La Salle, which last year rallied for a 35-31 win over the Vikings, slipped to 3-2. 
The Explorers scored on their first three possessions of the second half to make things interesting. Matt Savage's 30-yard field goal, Chris Ferguson's 2-yard keeper, and Ferguson's 25-yard pass to fleet handyman Nick Rinella trimmed the gap to 21-17. 
Down by 24-17 midway through the fourth quarter, Ferguson directed an eight-play, 72-yard scoring drive. Syaire Madden's 12-yard burst around left end evened things at 24. Madden carried 20 times for 104 yards. 
Russo, who is ticketed for Rutgers, completed 15 of 22 passes for 248 yards. He was 10 for 15 for 186 yards in a sparkling first-half performance. 
On the first play from scrimmage, Russo hit Raheem Blackshear (15 carries for 84 yards) for a 51-yard gain. Three plays later, his 16-yard throw to Mark Webb provided an early lead. 
Late in the first quarter, Russo rolled right and found Shawn Thompson for a 7-yard touchdown. His 11-yard, second-quarter toss to tight end Anthony Diodato made it 21-0. 
A Wood defense that held La Salle to minus-1 yard rushing and 43 yards passing before intermission was anchored by end Mack Schwartz (second-quarter sack) and linebackers Sebastian Silva and Matt Palmer. 
Archbishop Wood 14 7 0 6 - 27 
La Salle 0 0 17 7 - 24 
AW: Mark Webb 16 pass from Anthony Russo (Dan Zanine kick) 
AW: Shawn Thompson 3 pass from Russo (Zanine kick) 
AW: Anthony Diodato 11 pass from Russo (Zanine kick) 
LS: FG Matt Savage 30 
LS: Chris Ferguson 2 run (Savage kick) 
LS: Nick Rinella 25 pass from Ferguson (Savage kick) 
AW: FG Zanine 22 
LS: Syaire Madden 12 run (Savage kick) 
AW: FG Zanine 25
